title: Save $10 on your Deathloop pre-order with Best Buy's PS5 deals
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Grab $10 in Best Buy rewards in the latest PS5 deals
article: Next-gen gaming can get pricey pretty fast but Best Buy Members have a shortcut to saving cash on the latest releases. Right now, members will receive $10 in rewards when they pre-order Deathloop or Far Cry 6, effectively bringing the price of each game down to just $49.99. What's more, Best Buy membership is completely free, and we regularly see PS5 deals offering savings on the latest titles before they even hit the shelves here.

That's a pretty high value rewards scheme considering there's no cost for membership. For context, the free tier of the similar GameStop PowerUp loyalty promotion offers a $10 reward credit after 10,000 points, with $1 spent netting you just 10 points. That makes Best Buy's PS5 deals far more lucrative, especially if you're looking to get your hands on games from day one.
The free My Best Buy membership rewards you with points for all of your purchases across the site and also offers exclusive discounts throughout the year as well.
Right now Deathloop and Far Cry 6 are the only pre-order options for PS5, but if you are a member we'd recommend keeping a close eye on this page because featured titles do rotate in and out.
